## utils

Light JS/TS utils library.

## Classes

| Class                     | Description                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Deferred](./Deferred.md) | Promise wrapper that allows to manipulate it more easily by making and accessible outside the usual callback.<br /><br /> |
| [Subject](./Subject.md)   | Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values.<br /><br />                                     |

## Functions

| Function            | Description                                                                                               |
| ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [getIn](./getIn.md) | Allows to get a value deeply in an object without throwing an exception if the path does not exist.<br /> |

## TypeAliases

| TypeAlias                         | Description                                            |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Subscription](./Subscription.md) | Callback that will receive Subject values.<br /><br /> |
